description: This file defines interfaces for system management, discovery, configuration, lifetime management, and metadata within the WPEFramework plugins infrastructure. It contains pure virtual classes with methods that must be implemented by concrete classes, specifying various plugin and system control functionalities.
external_methods: Core::hresult Clone(const string& callsign, const string& newcallsign, string& response)
Core::hresult Environment(const string& index, string& environment) const
Core::hresult Configuration(const string& callsign, string& configuration) const
Core::hresult Configuration(const string& callsign, const string& configuration)
Core::hresult Hibernate(const string& callsign, const Core::hresult timeout)
Core::hresult Status(const string& index, string& response)
Core::hresult CallStack(const string& index, string& callstack)

classes.name: ISystemManagement
classes.description: Interface providing system management operations like reboot, delete, clone, and environment variable retrieval.

classes.name: IDiscovery
classes.description: Interface for network discovery features such as starting discovery and retrieving discovery results.

classes.name: IConfiguration
classes.description: Interface for configuration management including storing and retrieving configuration data.

classes.name: ILifeTime
classes.description: Interface managing plugin lifecycle events, including activation, deactivation, suspend, resume, and notifications.

classes.name: IMetadata
classes.description: Interface providing metadata about the framework, such as proxies, status, links, process info, subsystems, version, and callstack details.

methods.name: Reboot
methods.description: Reboots the device/system.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes the contents of a specified directory from persistent storage.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a clone of a plugin with a new callsign.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a specified environment variable.

methods.name: StartDiscovery
methods.description: Initiates SSDP network discovery.

methods.name: DiscoveryResults
methods.description: Returns SSDP network discovery results.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Stores the current configuration to persistent memory.

methods.name: Configuration
methods.description: Retrieves or sets the configuration for a specified callsign.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a sink for lifetime notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a sink from lifetime notifications.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates a plugin given its callsign.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates a plugin given its callsign.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks a plugin as unavailable for interaction.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Puts a plugin into Hibernate state with optional timeout.

methods.name: Suspend
methods.description: Suspends a plugin.

methods.name: Resume
methods.description: Resumes a suspended plugin.

methods.name: Proxies
methods.description: Provides details of currently running proxy instances.

methods.name: Status
methods.description: Provides status information for a plugin.

methods.name: Links
methods.description: Provides active connection details.

methods.name: ProcessInfo
methods.description: Provides framework process information.

methods.name: Subsystems
methods.description: Provides details of active subsystems.

methods.name: Version
methods.description: Provides version information of the framework.

methods.name: CallStack
methods.description: Returns callstack information associated with a thread index.

calls: Core::hresult Clone(const string& callsign, const string& newcallsign, string& response)
Core::hresult Environment(const string& index, string& environment) const
Core::hresult Configuration(const string& callsign, string& configuration) const
Core::hresult Configuration(const string& callsign, const string& configuration)
Core::hresult Hibernate(const string& callsign, const Core::hresult timeout)
Core::hresult Status(const string& index, string& response)
Core::hresult CallStack(const string& index, string& callstack)

ctags.name: IConfiguration
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IConfiguration : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IDiscovery
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IDiscovery : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ILifeTime
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ILifeTime : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IMetadata
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IMetadata : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ISystemManagement
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ISystemManagement : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
